bio: a 20 yrs old boy from india !!!!
contributionDescription:
We provided over 100 OP News updates to our audience of 2,000 podcast listeners and 230 newsletter subscribers.
In the fast-changing Optimism Collective, we play a crucial role in keeping users well-informed. OP News is a series of Optimism-related updates featured within our Ethereum News flash briefing in a dedicated segment called
Optimism Highlights.

contributionLinks.description: I Retweet Some Posts Of Optimism On Twitter ...

impactDescription:
Our daily briefing boosts Optimism Collective's brand awareness, reaching over 2,000 crypto enthusiasts. We
provide essential OP News coverage, keeping end-users, developers, journalists, and crypto security firms informed about network upgrades, new OP Stack chains, and airdrops. Our briefs have even inspired news articles, like this one published by The Block on Optimism Airdrop 3 after the journalist read our newsletter.
pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, User Experience & Adoption
